text: Tyanna sanmargavara anane tumacya avakhyatila gosta navhe, kimbahuna allaha jyala icchito margadarsana karato ani tumhi ji cangali vastu allahacya margata dyala, tyaca labha svatah prapta karala. Tumhi kevala sarvasrestha allahaci prasannata prapta karanyakarita kharca kela pahije. Tumhi je kahi dhana kharca karala, tyacya purepura mobadala tumhala dila ja'ila ani tumaca hakka marala janara nahi
